posts.post_title: FS:T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait SGC 30
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Daryle
Need to sell ASAP.......
T206 Cobb Red SGC30
Decent card. Good color. Has light crease/wrinkle at left shoulder. Light staining. Back has small spot of paper loss on left hand side.

Asking $775 dlvd  (PAYPAL preferred)

****1st to POST on board owns it.......the ole "I'll Take It"




[URL="http://s123.photobucket.com/albums/o313/wolfie70/?action=view%C2%A4t=t206cobbf.jpg"][IMG]http://i123.photobucket.com/albums/o313/wolfie70/t206cobbf.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Dang Daryl.  I already have my Cobb Red, or I would grab this one in two seconds.   That is a really good price on a great looking 2.

Good luck with it.  

J
